articles.title: An Introduction to the Hitchhiker Tree
articles.author: Christian Weilbach
articles.description: The goal of the Hitchhiker tree is to wed three things: the query performance of a B+ tree, the write performance of an append-only log, and convenience of a functional, persistent data structure.
